config_description: /** * Database setting OPTIMIZE_SIMPLE_SINGLE_ROW_SUBQUERIES (default: true). * Optimize expressions of the form (SELECT A) to A. */
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration OPTIMIZE_SIMPLE_SINGLE_ROW_SUBQUERIES is used to optimize expressions of the form (SELECT A) to A. In the code, the configuration is checked before optimizing the query. If the setting optimizeSimpleSingleRowSubqueries is enabled in the database settings, and the query is a single row subquery, it will be optimized to return the value directly.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the configuration OPTIMIZE_SIMPLE_SINGLE_ROW_SUBQUERIES depends on the queries being executed in the system. If there are many single row subqueries in the queries being executed, then this configuration will be triggered more frequently.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the configuration option OPTIMIZE_SIMPLE_SINGLE_ROW_SUBQUERIES is to improve the performance of the system by optimizing single row subqueries. This can lead to faster query execution times and potentially reduce resource consumption.
